value.0:
Basics of Enchanting
---------------------------------

1) Enchanters can make a variety of items as well as enchant weapons, armor and shields. Enchanters require items made by Tinkering, Gem Crafting, Weapon Crafting, Armor crafting, Baking, Alchemy and Smelting. 

2) Enchanters use the following crafting devices: 

Enchanting Alter: Used to create elemental bags, enchanted gems and enchanted ingots. 

Enchanting Statue: Used to enchant shields. 

Enchanting Pool: Used to enchant weapons.
